records.question: What is RAG?
records.answer: RAG refers to retrieval-augmented generation, which retrieves knowledge base facts so the LLM can answer more accurately.
contexts: RAG combines retrieval and generation so the model can reference factual knowledge base content.
records.ground_truth: RAG stands for Retrieval-Augmented Generation and improves answer accuracy by retrieving knowledge base context for the LLM.
